Package assignment

Class PrimeNumThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • assignment.PrimeNumThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOutput, IPrime, java.lang.Runnable
    public class PrimeNumThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements IPrime, IOutput
    Special class which extends Thread class and find all prime numbers in a range

      • run

        public void run()
        Necessary to implement thread action Intially print Thread info and then take every value from partition array and check if it is prime only if value on that position is different by null After the array is finished, is printed the array which contains all prime numbers

        Parameters:

        Returns:
